description: Advisory published when a message have reached its maximum delivery attempts
title: io.nats.jetstream.advisory.v1.max_deliver

id.description: Unique correlation ID for this event

timestamp.description: The time this event was created in RFC3339 format

stream.description: The name of the stream where the message is stored

consumer.description: The name of the consumer where the message reached its limit

stream_seq.description: The sequence of the message in the stream that failed

deliveries.description: The number of deliveries that were attempted
